function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of AI-based tools for triaging and managing COVID-19 patients","Impact":"Reliance on technology for critical medical decision-making","Mitigation":"Ensure thorough validation and verification of AI outputs by medical professionals","Technologies":"AI-based chest X-ray analysis, CT image screening systems","People":"Healthcare providers, symptomatic patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Collection and utilization of anonymous user movement data for contact tracing","Impact":"Privacy concerns and potential misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to data privacy regulations and anonymization of datasets","Technologies":"Big data analytics, location mapping","People":"General public","Owner":"Government agencies, tech companies"},{"Description":"Integration of automated chatbots for official information transmission","Impact":"Reliance on automated systems for public healthcare communication","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and updating of chatbot information by healthcare authorities","Technologies":"Chatbot technology, WhatsApp integration","People":"Spanish citizens","Owner":"Healthcare authorities, tech firms"}]}
